packages.title: Premium Package for SE
details: Proximity Key entry with push button start
Leather-wrapped steering wheel and shift knob
Hands-free Smart Liftgate with auto open
Dual-zone automatic temperature control with CleanAir Ionizer
Electroluminescent Gauge Cluster with color LCD Display

packages.title: Ultimate Package for SE
details:
Integrated Memory System (IMS) for driver seat and side
					mirrors

packages.title: Ultimate Package for Limited
details:
Integrated Memory System (IMS) for driver seat and side
					mirrors

specs.name:
Front suspension: MacPherson struts with gas-filled damper
							and stabilizer bar

Rear suspension: Multi-link with gas shock absorber and
							stabilizer bar
Height (in., with roof rack side rails)
Cargo volume (cu. ft.) Behind front seats

4-wheel, 4-channel Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) with
							Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD) and Brake Assist (BA)
Driver and front passenger advanced airbags (SRS) (2)

Driver and front passenger seat-mounted side-impact airbags
							(SRS) (2)

Roof-mounted side-curtain airbags with rollover sensors
							(SRS) (2)
Front seatbelt pretensioners and force limiters
2nd-row LATCH (Lower Anchors and Tethers for CHildren)
Remote keyless entry system with alarm
Bodycolor dual power manual-folding side mirrors

Bodycolor rear spoiler with LED Center High-Mount Stop Light
							(CHMSL)
Chrome accent grille and door handles
Front solar glass and rear privacy glass
Proximity Key entry with push button start
Hands-free Smart Liftgate with auto open
Proximity Key entry with push button start

Dual front automatic temperature control with CleanAir
							Ionizer
Power windows with driver and passenger auto-down/up

Integrated Memory System (IMS) for driver seat and side
							mirrors
8-way power driver seat with 4-way power lumbar support
Sliding and reclining 2nd-row seats with cargo-area releases

Cupholders: front center (2) rear center armrest (2)* doors
							(4) (*on SE only)
Sunvisors with illuminated vanity mirrors and extensions
Leather-wrapped steering wheel and shift knob
Steering-wheel-mounted audio, cruise and phone controls

4.3-inch touchscreen color audio system with rearview
							camera

Complimentary SiriusXM activation and 3-month trial
							subscription
Electroluminescent Gauge Cluster with color LCD Multi-Functional Display
